FilterRule.description: Specifies which files folders and objects to include or exclude when transferring files from source to destination.

FilterType.description: The type of filter rule to apply. AWS DataSync only supports the SIMPLE_PATTERN rule type.
FilterType.markdownDescription:
The type of filter rule to apply. AWS DataSync only supports the SIMPLE_PATTERN rule type.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SIMPLE_PATTERN  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[A-Z0-9_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: A single filter string that consists of the patterns to include or exclude. The patterns are delimited by "|".
Value.markdownDescription:
A single filter string that consists of the patterns to include or exclude. The patterns are delimited by "|".

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 409600  
Pattern: ^[^\x00]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

FilterRule.markdownDescription:
Specifies which files folders and objects to include or exclude when transferring files from source to destination.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskSchedule.description: Specifies the schedule you want your task to use for repeated executions.

ScheduleExpression.description: A cron expression that specifies when AWS DataSync initiates a scheduled transfer from a source to a destination location
ScheduleExpression.markdownDescription:
A cron expression that specifies when AWS DataSync initiates a scheduled transfer from a source to a destination location

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\ \_\*\?\,\|\^\-\/\#\s\(\)\+]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskSchedule.markdownDescription:
Specifies the schedule you want your task to use for repeated executions.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Options.description: Represents the options that are available to control the behavior of a StartTaskExecution operation.

Atime.description: A file metadata value that shows the last time a file was accessed (that is, when the file was read or written to).
Atime.markdownDescription:
A file metadata value that shows the last time a file was accessed (that is, when the file was read or written to).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | BEST_EFFORT  
Update requires: No interruption

BytesPerSecond.description: A value that limits the bandwidth used by AWS DataSync.
BytesPerSecond.markdownDescription:
A value that limits the bandwidth used by AWS DataSync.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Gid.description: The group ID (GID) of the file's owners.
Gid.markdownDescription:
The group ID (GID) of the file's owners.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | INT_VALUE | NAME | BOTH  
Update requires: No interruption

LogLevel.description: A value that determines the types of logs that DataSync publishes to a log stream in the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you provide.
LogLevel.markdownDescription:
A value that determines the types of logs that DataSync publishes to a log stream in the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you provide.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: OFF | BASIC | TRANSFER  
Update requires: No interruption

Mtime.description: A value that indicates the last time that a file was modified (that is, a file was written to) before the PREPARING phase.
Mtime.markdownDescription:
A value that indicates the last time that a file was modified (that is, a file was written to) before the PREPARING phase.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | PRESERVE  
Update requires: No interruption

OverwriteMode.description: A value that determines whether files at the destination should be overwritten or preserved when copying files.
OverwriteMode.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether files at the destination should be overwritten or preserved when copying files.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ALWAYS | NEVER  
Update requires: No interruption

PosixPermissions.description: A value that determines which users or groups can access a file for a specific purpose such as reading, writing, or execution of the file.
PosixPermissions.markdownDescription:
A value that determines which users or groups can access a file for a specific purpose such as reading, writing, or execution of the file.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | PRESERVE  
Update requires: No interruption

PreserveDeletedFiles.description: A value that specifies whether files in the destination that don't exist in the source file system should be preserved.
PreserveDeletedFiles.markdownDescription:
A value that specifies whether files in the destination that don't exist in the source file system should be preserved.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PRESERVE | REMOVE  
Update requires: No interruption

PreserveDevices.description: A value that determines whether AWS DataSync should preserve the metadata of block and character devices in the source file system, and recreate the files with that device name and metadata on the destination.
PreserveDevices.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether AWS DataSync should preserve the metadata of block and character devices in the source file system, and recreate the files with that device name and metadata on the destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | PRESERVE  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityDescriptorCopyFlags.description: A value that determines which components of the SMB security descriptor are copied during transfer.
SecurityDescriptorCopyFlags.markdownDescription:
A value that determines which components of the SMB security descriptor are copied during transfer.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | OWNER_DACL | OWNER_DACL_SACL  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskQueueing.description: A value that determines whether tasks should be queued before executing the tasks.
TaskQueueing.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether tasks should be queued before executing the tasks.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

TransferMode.description: A value that determines whether DataSync transfers only the data and metadata that differ between the source and the destination location, or whether DataSync transfers all the content from the source, without comparing to the destination location.
TransferMode.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether DataSync transfers only the data and metadata that differ between the source and the destination location, or whether DataSync transfers all the content from the source, without comparing to the destination location.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CHANGED | ALL  
Update requires: No interruption

Uid.description: The user ID (UID) of the file's owner.
Uid.markdownDescription:
The user ID (UID) of the file's owner.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | INT_VALUE | NAME | BOTH  
Update requires: No interruption

VerifyMode.description: A value that determines whether a data integrity verification should be performed at the end of a task execution after all data and metadata have been transferred.
VerifyMode.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether a data integrity verification should be performed at the end of a task execution after all data and metadata have been transferred.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: POINT_IN_TIME_CONSISTENT | ONLY_FILES_TRANSFERRED | NONE  
Update requires: No interruption

ObjectTags.description: A value that determines whether object tags should be read from the source object store and written to the destination object store.
ObjectTags.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether object tags should be read from the source object store and written to the destination object store.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PRESERVE | NONE  
Update requires: No interruption

Options.markdownDescription:
Represents the options that are available to control the behavior of a StartTaskExecution operation.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[\-a-z]{0,}:ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:network-interface/eni-[0-9a-f]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

SourceNetworkInterfaceArns.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the source ENIs (Elastic Network Interfaces) that were created for your subnet.

items.markdownDescription:

Required: No

Pattern: ^arn:aws[\-a-z]{0,}:ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:network-interface/eni-[0-9a-f]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

DestinationNetworkInterfaceArns.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CloudWatchLogGroupArn.description: The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that is used to monitor and log events in the task.

The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that is used to monitor and log events in the task.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 562  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):logs:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:log-group:([^:\*]*)(:\*)?$  
Update requires: No interruption

The ARN of an AWS storage resource's location.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: Replacement

The name of a task. This value is a text reference that is used to identify the task in the console.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: Yes
